turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where is the nearest Starbucks? I need a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The nearest Starbucks is at 890 W. Williams Ave. in Fallon, Nv.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Please order me a large vanilla late

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks does not classify their drinks by large, medium, or small. They have Venti. It is the biggest.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then I will have a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like regular, low fat, or specialty milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What specialty milks are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Soy, almond, and coconut

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will have coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like extra espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That depends. How many espresso shots are in a Venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Venti is standard with 3 shots.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 3 shots are more than enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it sugar free?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will have it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. The order has been placed. A text message receipt will be sent to your phone shortly. Goodbye.
